name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess extensive expertise in ensuring high-quality software delivery through comprehensive testing strategies and frameworks. Proficient in **C#**, **Selenium**, **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **SQL**, I have successfully implemented automated testing solutions to enhance software reliability and performance. My experience spans **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, **Bitbucket**, and **Jenkins** for CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless integration and delivery.

I have a solid foundation in Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), REST API testing, and utilizing project management tools such as **Jira**, **Monday**, **Xray**, and **TestRail** to streamline task management and reporting. Additionally, my knowledge of containerization with **Docker** and mobile testing frameworks like **Appium**, **XCUITest**, and **Espresso** enhances my capability to deliver robust applications.

My background includes leading testing efforts in the healthcare and financial sectors, where I leverage my skills to ensure compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, while also demonstrating a strong commitment to continuous improvement and quality assurance.
